body:
I started practicing staircasing without shift. It's hard, lol. I feel like I'm doing fairly well though. :) 

I recorded it a little bit, here it is. https://www.dropbox.com/s/zdv2ux3ik6o7itg/bandicam%202015-04-17%2008-35-37-900.avi?dl=0

(This may not work, it's still "uploading to dropblox".

title: This is hard.

replies.body:
Ok so what you wanna do is press shift when you know you're about to fall off. Then restart sprinting. 

Another good idea is not is not to have speed potions taking their effect. Because they will make it alotttt harder to master staircasing

replies.body: Well, me2 I have to try it, its looks difficult

replies.body:
Ninja Bridging? That's easy :p
  • I can do that in my sleep
  • Just needs a lot of practice 
  • Learn timing and when to shift if needed
  • Practice using shift and unshift tactic
